resources.string: Description: A delicious, customizable burrito packed with fluffy rice, savory beans, tender protein, and fresh toppings. Perfect for lunch or dinner, it’s easy to make, satisfying, and bursting with flavors in every bite. Wrap it up and enjoy a handheld meal that’s both hearty and comforting.

string-array.name: burrito_steps
string-array.item: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Warm tortillas for 20–30 seconds on each side.
Lay the tortilla flat and layer rice, beans, and protein in the center.
Add salsa, sour cream, and lettuce.
Fold the sides of the tortilla inwards, then roll it tightly from the bottom.
Serve warm, optionally cut in half.
